job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree or 6 yrs. or more years of work experience.

jd: From: Arjun, fluxteksol.com arjuna@fluxteksol.com Reply to: arjuna@fluxteksol.com Role Description:Job Title: Oracle DBA w/TSJob Location: (Remote)Job Duration: + 12 MonthsExperience: 5+Visa Status: USC --- TOP SECURITY clearance CERITIFICATE active We really need someone who is hands on on:1) RAC2) Goldengate3) Standby Database creation4) Performance Tuning5) Goldengate Replication/GG ReplicationData Guard Job Description:• Bachelor’s degree or 6 yrs. or more years of work experience.• Experience administering Oracle 19c/12c/11g RAC databases and PostgreSQL• Solid working experience on Oracle Exadata and ZFS Storage Appliances.• Experience on UNIX/Linux and shell scriptingEven better if you have:• Experience with planning, building, implementing, administering, and maintaining on High Availability (HA) Setup of Oracle Real Application Clustering (RAC) database on Oracle 11g/12c/19c RDBMS, Grid infrastructure (GI), Automatic Storage Management (ASM), Data Guard and applying patches of GI and Oracle 11g/12c/19c RDBMS software binaries on Unix/Linux environments.• Experience in Oracle multitenant architecture, Container database, PDB hot clones, PDB refresh, relocation, plug/unplug and PDB level failover capability with Data Guard Broker.• Strong Working knowledge in performance analysis, tuning, ensures optimal database performance through exhaustive pre-service testing and ongoing real-time monitoring using Oracle Enterprise manager, SQL Tuning advisor, AWR, ADDM, ASH and other tools & techniques.• Experience with Performance Tuning & Troubleshooting and find a quicker resolution.• Experience with Software Products: Oracle 12c/19c, RMAN, Oracle Data Guard (Physical and Active), Golden Gate, Partitioning, Advanced Security, OEM 13c, Exadata with Extreme Flash Storage including patching/upgrade/Provisioning/monitoring.
